name: Huawei Honor V8
description: Huawei Honor V8 Android smartphone. Announced 2016, May. Features 5.7″ IPS-NEO LCD capacitive touchscreen, Dual 12 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Display.Resolution: 1080 x 1920 pixels (KNT-AL10, KNT-TL10) (~386 ppi pixel density)1440 x 2560 pixels (KNT-AL20) (~515 ppi pixel density)

Platform.CPU: Quad-core 2.3 GHz Cortex-A72 + quad-core 1.8 GHz Cortex A53Quad-core 2.5 GHz Cortex-A72 + quad-core 1.8 GHz Cortex A53

Memory.Card slot: microSD, up to 128 GB (uses SIM 2 slot)
Memory.Internal: 32 GB, 4 GB RAM64 GB, 4 GB RAM (KNT-AL20)

Camera.Primary: Dual 12 MP, f/2.2, 27 mm, phase detection autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash
Camera.Features: 1.25 �m pixel size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, panorama, HDR

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, DLNA, WiFi Direct, hotspot
Comms.GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS/ BDS (market dependant)

Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
Others: Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
